title: Stock & Aged WIP Financial Data
summary: This spreadsheet contains financial data related to stock and aged work-in-progress (WIP) in both USD and local currency (LCY). It includes two sheets: 'Stock & Aged WIP USD' and 'Stock & Aged WIP LCY'. The data is organized by connection name, scenario, years, period, and view, with columns representing various time periods and fiscal years from FY17 to FY25. The sheets utilize formulas such as VLOOKUP and reference cells to calculate values across different fiscal periods, providing a comprehensive view of actuals and budget forecasts.
